alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 2:40AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Greene and western Clay Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 239 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Maynard to Pocahontas to near Imboden. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Paragould, Corning, Crowleys Ridge State Park, Lake Frierson State Park, Oak Grove Heights, Lafe, Reyno, Knobel, O`Kean, Success, Peach Orchard, Delaplaine, Datto, Evening Star, Walcott, Beech Grove, Fontaine, Stonewall, Case and Brookings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
